name: Blaze Bots
description:
Hide from robots in a spaceship by solving puzzles and changing bot paths.
Explore THE BLAZE, a spaceship ran by bots which recently became disfunctional! Be careful as you move, use or hide from different types of bots. Play as the ship's repair-unit and save the locked-in crew! I am Wardius, a solo game developer and made this game in about six months. I really hope you have fun playing! :)
